评论详情: I bought 2 of these I the colors and it fit well im5'2 160 pounds got a large don't go smaller than a large if you are the same size as me i wear a size 12 or large. Going below that would be tight in the arms. good for layering wish it covered my butt but it does not, however it looks nice. Highly recommend, Softness good, warmth good, weight good. Have not washed these yet but I would put  on delicate wash maybe hang dry or on a sweater drying board. Value for money it was worth the money.
10/10! The quality fke the price is astounding. SOOOO SOFT and cozy, I got so many compliments on this!

So many fun colors to choose from, I finally chose one. This is a very nice sweater. The sleeves are large enough diameter that you can easily wear long sleeves beneath it. They're long enough for my arms (I usually order tall sizes), and the cuff fits nicely so any extra length won't have the sleeve covering your hand. I'll be ordering the green/blue next.

I’m obsessed with this sweater, it’s great quality had a nice weight to it, it’s warm and cozy! Definitely worth the price it’s super cute and soft! It’s true to size but has this oversized feel to it just like in the photo
Liked the quality of the sweater and the pattern but it is not as long as it is pictured

Sweater is soft, style is baggy (& I ordered a size up for extra baby sizing) color is very true to image. Purchased for daughter’s birthday & out of all the clothes I got for her - this is the one she put on on her actual birthday - her favorite color is purple & I think she loved this.
Cute Colors …. Little flat
Really like this sweater. It’s not as thin as some knits I’ve seen on amazon and other sites,  but not so thick that it’s too hot or doesn’t have movement. Pleasantly surprised.
Super cute sweater. Very soft doesn’t look or feel cheap. Is an oversized fit so you could size down a size or 2 depending on how you want it to fit. Pattern is so trendy as well
love this! Such vibrant fun colors, great quality, oversized fit and pretty warm and soft!

评论概述: Pattern and color nice. Quality not as much
评论详情: Looks cheaply made. Soft material and nice pattern
Color, chunky knit, slouchy fit. Excellent
Fits perfectly

This is such a cute sweater. It’s very heavy and warm. I got the black and white. The shipping took a month but that’s okay, it wasn’t on Prime. I paid $19.99 for it and it’s definitely worth the extra shipping time for the good price. It’s soft, I usually wear a L and I ordered a L in this and it’s slightly oversized in a good way. It seems to be of good quality. I have worn it 2x and it doesn’t snag easily.  I have the Vans that match this and I order cute gold and enamel earrings, also from Amazon, that have the black and white checkered pattern. So cute! I am a teacher and my kids love it.
This sweater is so cute and very comfy!!
Super cute sweater! Well made and I loved the colors. Just a little too much of the baggy look for me.

I love wearing sweaters, hoodies, and cardigans, so I was excited to receive this sweater. Unfortunately, I was quite disappointed with it.  First, the color is not as nice as it appeared in the pictures. I understand that colors can differ, but the difference is not complementary compared to what is shown on the website. Additionally, some of the seams seem to be on the wrong side of the sweater, which gives it a cheap appearance, as if it wasn't assembled properly.  The yarn used to make this sweater is also not soft; it is made from a rough acrylic material that I don’t want against my skin. Furthermore, the sleeves are oddly shaped, causing the sweater to pull awkwardly when I lift or move my arms.  Based on this experience, I would not purchase this sweater again.
Just as advertised. Great colors and fit, well made.
SOFT AND CUTE LOVE IT!

评论概述: Pretty design but not good quality
评论详情: I wanted to love this cardigan. I am 5’10 and a frequent buyer of Free People where most of their sweaters and cardigans are comfortably oversized. I took a chance on this thinking that it would be heavy and the quality would be nice since the pictures make it appear that way. I ordered the XL for the oversized look. It is barely oversized, and extremely thin. You could not wear this outside on a cold day and expect to be warm. It’s a good light throw over, and I will keep just because I can wear it around the house. Just know that it is not thick and warm. It is very thin. The design is pretty though.
This color and pattern is so stylish and i bought leggins the color of the taupe brown….cant wait to wear!
This is my daughters favorite purchase of the year! She tries to wear it everyday. She loves the colors and loves the fabric. It's beautifully oversized on her and it makes her so happy.
It looks just like the photos, exactly, and is true to color and size. I love the orange and pink and how they evoke fall and femininity!

I got a ton of compliments when I wore this super fun cardigan. The colors are vibrant and happy. It wears comfortably and material is decent quality. I got this in a large and I am 5'3 180 lbs. Perfect sweater for fall.

This is the CUTEST trendy sweater! Pairs great with a white tank and jeans, so comfy! I get compliments every time I'm wearing this! Fit is TTS, very flattering! This is a staple and perfect fall/winter piece!
Love how oversized this is and all the colors. Not too thick but nice and cozy.
Very cute!
Love this checkered cardigan checkered  sweater!! Comfy, made well and stylish.  Wear with jeans, leggings, denim shorts or skirt!  One of every Color!

This is a review for the "SELINK Women's Cardigan Sweater Vintage Open Front Mixed Checkered Pattern Chunky Knit Plaid Long Sleeve Daily Outwear."  This sweater is adorable. It washed well, is soft, and fits as expected. Now, I just need to invite some people over so I can show it off and hear all the compliments:) Five stars!

This sweater exceeded all my expectations! It looks super cute on & can be dressed or down. It’s made (& washes) nicely & doesn’t feel rough/scratchy on the skin. For reference I’m 5’5, 165lbs, 36DD, short torso, size 12/XL jeans/bottoms, L/XL in tops, & the XL gives the perfect amount of oversized. It has the perfect amount of thickness to keep you warm if/when desired, but not warm to the point of sweating profusely. The weather hasn’t officially turned in TN yet, but I can’t wait to wear it more in the upcoming fall/winter seasons. 10/10 recommend adding this to your fashion lineup!

This is a nice cardigan. The size is true and the fabric is comfortable and soft. I thought I would fall in love with the color combo, not my style in person. Also, mine had some crochet string already unraveling. This is an item I’m on the fence about.

These colors sure aren't shy. It's loose and large and casual and fun. And funky. This for sure isn't everyone's style but I love it because it's so crazy. I wouldn't mind if it had a button, but it doesn't really need one. Overall, I like it.
This vintage-inspired checkered cardigan adds a fun, retro vibe to my outfits. The chunky knit is warm and cozy, making it perfect for layering during cooler days. I have really enjoyed wearing it.

评论概述: VINTAGE OVERSIZED SWEATER THAT IS SO ON TREND RIGHT NOW!
评论详情: Oversized funky statement piece cardigan that is definitely very bold and out there. The fabric I was surprised didn’t irritate my skin. It’s kind of soft, I like it. The weight is light weight, but still provides that depth of coziness and the look of fall. Paired with some platform doc martens, a crop top and some high waisted jeans ** chefs kiss**!
This chunky cardigan is actually chunky. It’s big and great quality. I love the vibrant colors and it fits perfectly.
This cardigan is so cozy and warm! The fit is nice and oversized. It is very soft as well. The bright colors are a lot of fun.

I ordered this cardigan in orange/size M, and the oversized fit is perfect! The material is soft and super comfortable, making it great for layering. I absolutely love the vibrant colors and the mixed checkered pattern—it adds a fun vibe. Can’t wait to style this for the fall. Would recommend!

This is a pretty open front cardigan.  I love the color combination; it's funky and fun.  It's very comfortable and is warm for those chilly days/nights.  If you want an oversized look/feel, order true to size.  I wanted it to be more 'regular' in fit, so I ordered a size smaller and am very pleased.
I really love this cardigan sweater. The colors are bright, bold, and beautiful. It fits nicely and is soft and comfortable. I am very happy with this product!

This cardigan is bright and bold and definitely a statement piece. The texture of it is accurate to the photos and the quality seems fine but it seems like it would need to be hung-dried in order to preserve the life of it. It is not as thick as it may seem from photos, so keep that in mind if you're looking for a fall/winter sweater to keep you cozy and warm. Really nice cardigan, especially if you want something fashionable and versatile.
I love this sweater so much. It's super casual but such an eye-catcher. It's effortlessly stylish and I'm so glad I grabbed this.

This sweater is an AMAZING oversized fit on me (size M usually). It is warm and cozy, while being especially cute as well! Looks adorable with pink leggings or yoga pants. Will definitely get tons of wear out of this during the fall and winter. Super stylish!! Would recommend.

I love the vibrant colors in this cardigan and the oversized fit of it, but it's thinner than I anticipated.  It's not very thin, but not thick and fluffy, like a blanket. It'll definitely do on a "sweater weather" kind of day.
Love the colors, lightweight, nice fit. It's comfortable and good quality. 🥳🥳

评论概述: A stylish mixed checkered pattern, crafted in a chunky knit.
评论详情: The SELINK Women's Cardigan Sweater features a vintage open front design with a stylish mixed checkered pattern, crafted in a chunky knit. This plaid long sleeve piece is perfect for everyday wear.

I absolutely love this sweater!! Made with really nice quality materials. Soft and comfy. The colors are beautiful and vibrant together. Has a nice oversized loose fit. Perfect to add on over a tshirt/tank for cooler weather.

its that time of year again -- where the kiddo needs to secure a classroom cardigan, that she can keep at school just in case temps drop during our Great Lakes fall days. She was soooo into these, the poppy colors caught her eye even though she's getting more into blacks and grays (thanks Wednesday).  This is the ideal loungey chill clothing as blanket sweater -- its not super soft, or luxe ... but just kinda and friendly enough on the skin to be your every day goto, morning coffee, evening tea, robe-like item ...  Sure to turn heads when the tweensta pops it out of her locker for the first time!

I loved this Vintage Cardigan Sweater, it was love at first sight, when I put it on and felt its fabric I felt so comfortable and beautiful with it, it is fantastic to wear in spring and winter, the best thing is that it combines with all types of clothing, you can put it in the washing machine and dryer without worrying about it suffering any damage, it has become one of my favorite items of clothing.
I’ve had this cardigan for about two months now and I love it. It’s pretty well made and it’s so cute with leggings or jeans! It washes well and seems to be holding up pretty good!

it's really comfy and warm so i'm going to keep it but it doesn't look as cool as the picture. i expected the arms to be more interesting, voluminous, but they're just cut like regular sweater sleeves
